title: CryptopreneurBrainboss
author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
created_time: May 10, 2022, 07:37:46 AMLast edit: June 14, 2022, 09:32:19 AM by CryptopreneurBrainboss
content: Bounty Details★ LOOTaDOG bounty campaign will last for 4 weeks and managed by Brainboss Management Service.Yes legally it's.★ By joining this campaign, all participants accept that their works can be used by the team as promotional materials.★ All participants must join/follow the OFFICIAL SOCIAL ACCOUNTS of LOOTaDOG above to get accepted.★ Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed. You will be disqualified from the bounty program immediately and all your accounts will be banned permanently.★ Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.★ Newbies are welcomed to participate in this campaign although account created after the thread was published will be disqualified from participating.★ All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.★ All reports (Twitter etc) should be sent at the end of week on this thread, use reporting format on spreedsheet to submit reports. No quoting of your previous reports, stakes are updated weekly.★ Team reserves the right to make any changes or end the campaign at any time.Proof of AuthenticationFormat:#Proof Of RegistrationForum Username: Forum Profile Link: Participated Campaigns:Bitcoin Wallet Address: Bounty AllocationTotal Budget : $5000 USDT paid in Bitcoin.Note: BTC will be sent within 1month after bounty ends by Brainboss Management Service.★ Twitter Campaign:   80%★ Discord Campaign:  20% Twitter CampaignRewards: maximum 2000 participantsRegistration Link: https://forms.gle/PxSTE5eNYwQhdXxm63 Valid Tweets,  3 Retweets & 3 likes  -   3 Stakes/week5 Valid Tweets,  5 Retweets & 5 likes   -  5 Stakes/week   10 Valid Tweets, 10 Retweets & 10 likes   - 10 Stakes/week15 Valid Tweets, 15 Retweets & 15 likes  - 15 Stakes/week20 Valid Tweets,  20 Retweets & 20 likes  - 20 Stakes/week★ All participants must follow the Official Twitter account of LOOTaDOG .★ Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 500 followers and be original (90% in twitter audit for the last 1 month).★ Tweets & Hashtags should have the following hashtags and links: #LOOTaDOG #Walk2Earn #Doglovers #NFTdrops #dogs #Memecoin #NFTCollection #NFT #dogs #dogsoftwitter #doglover #animallovers #animallove #Play2Earn #NFTGameWebsite: https://lootadog.com/Note: All tasks should be done daily, using 1-3 days (excluding those doing 3 tasks) to complete tasks will result to no stakes for the week.  Discord CampaignRegistration Link: https://forms.gle/airaNSh35SzY4PsY7Rewards: maximum 1000 participantsPost in discord channel: 10 Stakes/week ( 10 posts per week) failure to meet requirements= no reward.Rules:★ All participants must join the Official Discord of LOOTaDOG .★ All Participants must invite 10 of their friends to projects discord channel or not get eligible for reward..★ Participates are to engage in discussion on the discord channel regularly and rank up to level 5 or not get eligible for reward..★ Posting repeatedly and with hashtags aren't allowed, send weekly report using reporting format on thread.★. No spamming, copy pasting or posting irrespective positive words instead engage in conversation, ask questions and provide answers etcNote: All tasks should be done daily, using 1-3 days to complete tasks will result to no stakes for the week.Ps: After registration, make sure to check the spreadsheet to confirm that you have been accepted before you start promotion. I am not responsible for you providing me any wrong information.Spreadsheet || Bounty Group  Bounty Duration Week 1: 11/05/2022 - 17/05/2022 EndedWeek 2: 18/05/2022 - 24/05/2022 EndedWeek 3: 25/05/2022 - 31/05/2022 EndedWeek 4: 01/06/2022 - 07/06/2022 Ongoing
